sql-descriptor.sql: CREATE TABLE CATBBRAP( BRAP_CORP_CODE VARCHAR(4), BRAP_STND_GUBN CHAR(1), BRAP_STND_DEGR VARCHAR(10), BRAP_MATL_SEQ0 NUMBER(5, 0), BRAP_KIND_CODE VARCHAR(8), BRAP_MATL_NAME VARCHAR(100), BRAP_WLDR_CODE VARCHAR(8), BRAP_LOSS_TYPE VARCHAR(8), BRAP_THIK_MIN0 NUMBER(14, 2), BRAP_THIK_MAX0 NUMBER(14, 2), BRAP_MATL_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), BRAP_LOAD_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), BRAP_PURE_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), BRAP_UNLO_PRIC NUMBER(14, 6), BRAP_NET0_CYT0 NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_CONV_SPED NUMBER(7, 0), BRAP_NET0_CYTL NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_NET0_CYTU NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_CAVT NUMBER(10, 0), BRAP_DFCT_RAT1 NUMBER(5, 2), BRAP_DFCT_RAT2 NUMBER(5, 2), BRAP_APLY_COEF NUMBER(5, 2), BRAP_BELT_LENG NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_WELD_PRIC NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_BRAZ_PRIC NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_PRSN_CNT0 NUMBER(7, 2), BRAP_MCHH_CODE VARCHAR(20), BRAP_APPL_GUBN CHAR(1), BRAP_REMK VARCHAR(200), BRAP_UPDT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAP_UPDT_DATE VARCHAR(8), BRAP_INIT_CMAN VARCHAR(8), BRAP_INIT_DATE VARCHAR(8), CONSTRAINT CATBBRAP_PK PRIMARY KEY ( BRAP_CORP_CODE, BRAP_STND_GUBN, BRAP_STND_DEGR, BRAP_MATL_SEQ0 ) )

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03, C04, C05) AS ( SELECT 1, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_CORP_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 4 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_STND_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_STND_DEGR', 'VARCHAR', 10 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_MATL_SEQ0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_KIND_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_MATL_NAME', 'VARCHAR', 100 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_WLDR_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_LOSS_TYPE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_THIK_MIN0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_THIK_MAX0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_MATL_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_LOAD_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_PURE_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_UNLO_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_NET0_CYT0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_CONV_SPED', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_NET0_CYTL', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_NET0_CYTU', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_CAVT', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 20, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_DFCT_RAT1', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 21, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_DFCT_RAT2', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 22, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_APLY_COEF', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 23, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_BELT_LENG', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 24, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_WELD_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_BRAZ_PRIC', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 26, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_PRSN_CNT0', 'NUMBER', 22 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 27, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_MCHH_CODE', 'VARCHAR', 20 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 28, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_APPL_GUBN', 'CHAR', 1 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 29, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_REMK', 'VARCHAR', 200 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 30, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_UPDT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 31, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_UPDT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 32, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_INIT_CMAN', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 33, 'CATBBRAP' , 'BRAP_INIT_DATE', 'VARCHAR', 8 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COLUMN_NAME IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_TAB_COLUMNS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = A.C02 AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C03 ORDER BY A.C01

WITH T01(C01, C02, C03) AS ( SELECT 1, 'BRAP_CORP_CODE', '법인코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 2, 'BRAP_STND_GUBN', '표준구분' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 3, 'BRAP_STND_DEGR', '개정차수 ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 4, 'BRAP_MATL_SEQ0', '재료SEQ' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 5, 'BRAP_KIND_CODE', '용접종류' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 6, 'BRAP_MATL_NAME', '재료명' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 7, 'BRAP_WLDR_CODE', '용접로' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 8, 'BRAP_LOSS_TYPE', '불량율TYPE' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 9, 'BRAP_THIK_MIN0', '두께 MIN' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 10, 'BRAP_THIK_MAX0', '두께 MAX' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 11, 'BRAP_MATL_PRIC', '재료비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 12, 'BRAP_LOAD_PRIC', 'LOADING 비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 13, 'BRAP_PURE_PRIC', '순수용접비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 14, 'BRAP_UNLO_PRIC', 'UNLOADING비' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 15, 'BRAP_NET0_CYT0', 'NET CT' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 16, 'BRAP_CONV_SPED', 'CONVEYOR속도' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 17, 'BRAP_NET0_CYTL', 'NET CT LOAD' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 18, 'BRAP_NET0_CYTU', 'NET CT UNLOAD' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 19, 'BRAP_CAVT', 'CVT' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 20, 'BRAP_DFCT_RAT1', '가공불량율' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 21, 'BRAP_DFCT_RAT2', '폐기불량율' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 22, 'BRAP_APLY_COEF', '적용계수' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 23, 'BRAP_BELT_LENG', 'BELT길이' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 24, 'BRAP_WELD_PRIC', '용가재금액' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 25, 'BRAP_BRAZ_PRIC', 'BRAZ소비금액' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 26, 'BRAP_PRSN_CNT0', '인원' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 27, 'BRAP_MCHH_CODE', '기계장비코드' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 28, 'BRAP_APPL_GUBN', '적용여부' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 29, 'BRAP_REMK', 'REMARK' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 30, 'BRAP_UPDT_CMAN', '수정자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 31, 'BRAP_UPDT_DATE', '수정일' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 32, 'BRAP_INIT_CMAN', '등록자' FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 33, 'BRAP_INIT_DATE', '등록일' FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.COMMENTS IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,B.TABLE_NAME ,B.COMMENTS ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS B ON B.TABLE_NAME = #table_name# AND B.COLUMN_NAME = A.C02
sql-descriptor.sq: WITH T01 ( BRAP_CORP_CODE ,BRAP_STND_GUBN ,BRAP_STND_DEGR ,BRAP_MATL_SEQ0 ,BRAP_KIND_CODE ,BRAP_MATL_NAME ,BRAP_WLDR_CODE ,BRAP_LOSS_TYPE ,BRAP_THIK_MIN0 ,BRAP_THIK_MAX0 ,BRAP_MATL_PRIC ,BRAP_LOAD_PRIC ,BRAP_PURE_PRIC ,BRAP_UNLO_PRIC ,BRAP_NET0_CYT0 ,BRAP_CONV_SPED ,BRAP_NET0_CYTL ,BRAP_NET0_CYTU ,BRAP_CAVT ,BRAP_DFCT_RAT1 ,BRAP_DFCT_RAT2 ,BRAP_APLY_COEF ,BRAP_BELT_LENG ,BRAP_WELD_PRIC ,BRAP_BRAZ_PRIC ,BRAP_PRSN_CNT0 ,BRAP_MCHH_CODE ,BRAP_APPL_GUBN ,BRAP_REMK ,BRAP_UPDT_CMAN ,BRAP_UPDT_DATE ,BRAP_INIT_CMAN ,BRAP_INIT_DATE ) AS ( #DATA_TEXT# ) SELECT CASE WHEN B.SYS_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END CHK_YN ,A.* FROM T01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN CATBBRAP B ON B.BRAP_CORP_CODE = A.BRAP_CORP_CODE AND B.BRAP_STND_GUBN = A.BRAP_STND_GUBN AND B.BRAP_STND_DEGR = A.BRAP_STND_DEGR AND B.BRAP_MATL_SEQ0 = A.BRAP_MATL_SEQ0
